titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4842) to implement the United States-Morocco Free Trade Agreement.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4842) to implement the United States-Morocco Free Trade Agreement.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-628, by Mr. Diaz-Balart, L..
During consideration of H.R. 4842, notwithstanding the operation of the previous question, the Chair may postpone further consideration of the bill to a time designated by the Speaker.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 213.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 738.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 345 - 76 (Roll no. 407).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4842) to implement the United States-Morocco Free Trade Agreement.
